AMO-Tools-Suite  v.0.3.3
Set of tools for calculating energy efficiency in industrial equipment

1 #include <algorithm>
2 #include "calculator/util/CHP.h"

4 CHP::CHP(double annualOperatingHours, double annualElectricityConsumption, double annualThermalDemand,
5  double boilerThermalFuelCosts, double avgElectricityCosts, Option calculationOption,
6  double boilerThermalFuelCostsCHPcase, double CHPfuelCosts,
7  double percentAvgkWhElectricCostAvoidedOrStandbyRate, double displacedThermalEfficiency,
8  double chpAvailability, double thermalUtilization)
9  : annualOperatingHours(annualOperatingHours), annualElectricityConsumption(annualElectricityConsumption),
10  annualThermalDemand(annualThermalDemand), boilerThermalFuelCosts(boilerThermalFuelCosts),
11  chpFuelCosts(CHPfuelCosts), avgElectricityCosts(avgElectricityCosts), calculationOption(calculationOption),
12  boilerThermalFuelCostsCHPcase(boilerThermalFuelCostsCHPcase),
13  displacedThermalEfficiency(displacedThermalEfficiency / 100), chpAvailability(chpAvailability / 100),
14  thermalUtilization(thermalUtilization / 100)
15 {
16  setCalculationOption(calculationOption, percentAvgkWhElectricCostAvoidedOrStandbyRate);
17  calculate();
18 }
19 
20 std::map<double, std::size_t>::const_iterator CHP::findNearest(const double val, const std::size_t index) const {
21  auto nearest = chpSystemByKey[index].upper_bound(val);
22  if (nearest != chpSystemByKey[index].begin()) return std::prev(nearest);
23  return nearest;
24 };
25 
26 void CHP::calculate() {
27  avgPowerDemand = annualElectricityConsumption / annualOperatingHours;
28  avgThermalDemand = annualThermalDemand / annualOperatingHours;
29 
30  auto nearest = findNearest(avgThermalDemand, 3);
31  netCHPpower = std::min(avgPowerDemand, (avgThermalDemand / nearest->first) * chpSystemByIndex[0][nearest->second]);
32 
33  if (netCHPpower < findNearest(avgThermalDemand, 0)->first) {
34  nearest = findNearest(netCHPpower, 1);
35  } else {
36  nearest = findNearest(avgThermalDemand, 1);
37  }
38  chpElectricEfficiency = nearest->first/ 100.0;
39 
40  nearest = findNearest(avgThermalDemand, 3);
41  auto val = chpSystemByIndex[0][nearest->second];
42  if (netCHPpower < val) {
43  nearest = findNearest(netCHPpower, 2);
44  } else {
45  nearest = findNearest(val, 2);
46  }
47  chpThermalOutput = nearest->first;
48 
49 // auto const chpThermalOutputMMBtuHr = chpThermalOutput * netCHPpower / 1000000;
50 
51  nearest = findNearest(avgThermalDemand, 3);
52  val = chpSystemByIndex[1][nearest->second];
53  if (netCHPpower < val) {
54  nearest = findNearest(netCHPpower, 4);
55  } else {
56  nearest = findNearest(val, 4);
57  }
58  auto const incrementalOandMcost = nearest->first;
59 
60  nearest = findNearest(avgThermalDemand, 3);
61  val = chpSystemByIndex[2][nearest->second];
62  if (netCHPpower < val) {
63  nearest = findNearest(netCHPpower, 5);
64  } else {
65  nearest = findNearest(val, 5);
66  }
67  auto const totalInstalledCosts = nearest->first;
68 
69  class Cases {
70  public:
71  Cases(const double base, const double chp) : baseCase(base), chpCase(chp) {}
72  const double baseCase, chpCase;
73  };
74 
75  auto const generatedElectricity = Cases(0, netCHPpower * annualOperatingHours * chpAvailability);
76  auto const purchasedElectricity = Cases(annualElectricityConsumption, annualElectricityConsumption - generatedElectricity.chpCase);
77  auto const chpThermal = Cases(0, (generatedElectricity.chpCase * chpThermalOutput * thermalUtilization) / 1000000);
78  auto const onSiteBoiler = Cases(annualThermalDemand, (annualThermalDemand - chpThermal.chpCase < 0) ? 0 : annualThermalDemand - chpThermal.chpCase);
79  auto const boilerHeaterFuel = Cases(annualThermalDemand / displacedThermalEfficiency, onSiteBoiler.chpCase / displacedThermalEfficiency);
80  auto const chpFuel = Cases(0, (generatedElectricity.chpCase * 3412) / (chpElectricEfficiency * 1000000));
81 // auto const totalFuel = Cases(boilerHeaterFuel.baseCase, boilerHeaterFuel.chpCase + chpFuel.chpCase); // unused
82 
83  // cost in $ stuff
84  auto const cost = (annualElectricityConsumption * avgElectricityCosts) - (generatedElectricity.chpCase
85  * avgElectricityCosts
86  * percentAvgkWhElectricCostAvoided);
87  auto const purchasedElectricityDollars = Cases(annualElectricityConsumption * avgElectricityCosts,
88  (!standbyRate) ? cost : purchasedElectricity.chpCase * avgElectricityCosts);
89  auto const standbyCharges = Cases(0, (percentAvgkWhElectricCostAvoided) ? 0 : standbyRate * netCHPpower * 12);
90  auto const chpFuelDollars = Cases(0, chpFuel.chpCase * chpFuelCosts);
91  auto const onSiteBoilerFuelDollars = Cases(boilerHeaterFuel.baseCase * boilerThermalFuelCosts,
92  boilerHeaterFuel.chpCase * boilerThermalFuelCostsCHPcase);
93  auto const incrementalOandM = Cases(0, incrementalOandMcost * generatedElectricity.chpCase);
94  auto const totalOperatingCosts = Cases(purchasedElectricityDollars.baseCase + onSiteBoilerFuelDollars.baseCase,
95  purchasedElectricityDollars.chpCase + standbyCharges.chpCase +
96  chpFuelDollars.chpCase +
97  onSiteBoilerFuelDollars.chpCase + incrementalOandM.chpCase);
98 
99  // simple payback
100  auto const annualOperationSavings = totalOperatingCosts.baseCase - totalOperatingCosts.chpCase;
101  auto const totalInstalledCostsPayback = totalInstalledCosts * netCHPpower;
102  auto const simplePayback = (totalInstalledCostsPayback - 200000) / annualOperationSavings;
103 
104  // operating costs to generate
105  auto const fuelCosts = chpFuelDollars.chpCase / generatedElectricity.chpCase;
106  auto const thermalCredit = -(onSiteBoilerFuelDollars.baseCase - onSiteBoilerFuelDollars.chpCase) / generatedElectricity.chpCase;
107  auto const incrementalOandMDollarsKwH = incrementalOandM.chpCase / generatedElectricity.chpCase;
108  auto const totalOperatingCostsToGenerate = fuelCosts + thermalCredit + incrementalOandMDollarsKwH;
109 
110  costInfo = {
111  {"annualOperationSavings", annualOperationSavings},
112  {"totalInstalledCostsPayback", totalInstalledCostsPayback},
113  {"simplePayback", simplePayback},
114  {"fuelCosts", fuelCosts},
115  {"thermalCredit", thermalCredit},
116  {"incrementalOandM", incrementalOandMDollarsKwH},
117  {"totalOperatingCosts", totalOperatingCostsToGenerate}
118  };
119 }

121 void CHP::setAnnualOperatingHours(const double annualOperatingHours) {
122  this->annualOperatingHours = annualOperatingHours;
123  calculate();
124 }

151 void CHP::setCalculationOption(const CHP::Option calculationOption,
152  const double percentAvgkWhElectricCostAvoidedOrStandbyRate) {
153  this->calculationOption = calculationOption;
154  if (calculationOption == Option::PercentAvgkWhElectricCostAvoided) {
155  percentAvgkWhElectricCostAvoided = percentAvgkWhElectricCostAvoidedOrStandbyRate / 100;
156  } else {
157  standbyRate = percentAvgkWhElectricCostAvoidedOrStandbyRate;
158  }
159  calculate();
160 }
